title: Participants in tackle football in the U.S. from 2006 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of participants in millions has decreased over the Year.

Number of participants in millions is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2010, slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2011, and lastly slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Number of participants in millions, about 8.4 was reported at Year 2006
Minimum Number of participants in millions about 5.99 was reached at Year 2011
